name: Bomb Smack
description:
Obliterate the demon hoards with your best friend, a bomb. Don't become seperated from your explosive buddy though, the results could be fatal... This game was made in a few days for the Gdevelop Game Jam #3.  Thanks for playing!

enemy sprites by 0x72, player sprites by Penusbmic, some u.i./fonts by Kenny, music/sfx and everything else by Ben Minnich.
